column9:
A "Lanthandel" is the traditional countryside store where the locals could buy everything they needed. 

This since a few years this has become a reality in Torna Hällestad. With focus on local produce, often ecological they offer a surprisingly large selection of food and other...More

The recently opened restaurant part of this unique country shop is a different dining experience to most. You become part of a small Swedish village for the evening, without compromising on quality. The streamlined menu offers a choice of animal or vegetable based dishes in...More

The Lanthandel in Torna Hällestad is a little jewel of a bakery-cum-countryside shop where you can also have a generous brunch on week-ends. The staff are nice and their specialty coffees are a nice surprise in this out-of-the-trodden-path part of the world.

column7: Helgmiddag med mycket god mat i lantlig och genuin miljö
column9: Ett mycket trevligt ställe med en kock som har respekt för råvaror och som brinner för att laga mat från...More

column7: Härlig matupplevelse i lantlig och avslappad miljö
column9: Vi var där med ett sällskap. Lanthandeln erbjuder en meny till rimlig pris med riktig god mat. Kan varmt rekommenderas.

column7: Bohemiskt men äkta och trevlig ställe
